original_title: Gayrı Resmi Bir Ailenin Pek Müşterek Hikayesi
overview: The seperated but not divorced, couple divided the house between them started thew own families on their side, and raised four generations in this absurd situation. One day, a newborn baby (belonging to both families) is found in the house and the quarrels which are never about the 'baby'-about the 'property' lead them toward their destruction.
title: The Very Bizarre Story of an Unofficial Family
